articles.description: It is a huge blow for both Jurgen Klopp and Gareth Southgate, who will now be without the right-back for England's friendlies, and Liverpool's manager said the issue will keep him sidelined for "weeks".
articles.content:
Trent Alexander-Arnold is facing a race to be ready for Liverpool's title showdown at Manchester City after he suffered hamstring damage.
It is a huge blow for both Jurgen Klopp and Gareth Southgate… [+3330 chars]

articles.author: Sam May
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo must change his game or he will not start every match, warns Gary Neville - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'But I think it would have to be a Ronaldo that would accept that he wouldn't play every single week and there would be moments that he wouldn't play and I think that's the big thing.
articles.content:
Manchester United legend Gary Neville has claimed Cristiano Ronaldo should change his game or risk not starting every match next campaign.
